parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The image contains a CMF number (CMF 11240060), indicating it's official electoral material for the REPER party.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post refers to the REPER party, which is participating in the parliamentary elections. While it doesn't mention specific candidates by name, the image clearly shows candidates Adrian Moleavin and Georgeta Dogaru.  Therefore, Article 36 (7) - a applies.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post, being a paid Facebook advertisement, targets a wide audience in Dâmbovița County, Romania. It's not a private message; therefore, it addresses the wide population. </addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The post's text, "Dâmbovița votes REPER on December 1st!", directly encourages voters to support REPER in the upcoming elections. This clearly has an electoral objective to influence the vote in favor of REPER. Article 36 (7) - c applies.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post is not journalistic in nature. It lacks any objective reporting, analysis, or opinion pieces. Its sole purpose is to promote the REPER party and encourage voting for them.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post does not express a personal opinion; instead, it's a clear call to action for electoral support.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1258668132017843</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post is a paid advertisement promoting the REPER party in the Romanian parliamentary elections.  The post's text explicitly encourages voters to support REPER. The presence of a CMF number confirms its status as official electoral material. The targeting of a wide audience in Dâmbovița County, coupled with the clear call to action, strongly suggests that this is electoral propaganda.  The post fulfills all criteria of Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006.  There are no counterarguments to suggest otherwise.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Adrian Moleavin</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Georgeta Dogaru</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>REPER</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
[Responsabilul de la REPER Dâmbovița], pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu textul „Dâmbovița votează REPER pe 1 decembrie!”, care îndeamnă direct la votarea partidului REPER și a candidaților săi, Adrian Moleavin și Georgeta Dogaru, prezentând totodată numărul CMF 11240060, fapt ce constituie propagandă electorală după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie, având un efect electoral clar de influențare a votului în favoarea REPER, conform articolului 36 (7) din LEGEA nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, și anume ID-ul postării pe Facebook: 1258668132017843.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
